content.altitude: Landed, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
There are too many things to put in 25 or less.... i've lived in this small midwestern town since i was thirteen. i fell in love with the stars, you can see the milky way right out the back door. there was a time when i wandered beneath the blackened sky with a safe feeling amongst the constellations...... now i'm terrified to take the dog out. the main even i'm reporting on, happened tonight. i've never seen so many unusual lights. but let me give you back story. 
a few summers before i moved here, there were reports in this very small, rural community about about three horses and a dog coming up mutilated. the owners found them with slit throats, methodically done. a friend of mine who lived on the property next door, found a jar sealed with wax, filled with dead honeybees. 

the activity started up very badly this past year. i have approximately 50 acres of land, we don't use the back part at all. there is a large hill that blocks view of the rest of it, and onward. the past year or so, i've seen these shimmering lights on that back hill. it may be further than my own property, but they are not constantly there. some nights you can't see them at all. they're ghostly, blueish white, some are coppery. they kind of... roam around back there. a week ago, i observed three lights rise from back there. they looked so close, like they were right on the back hill. one was a slim, rectangular panel of lights, that tilted from side to side very slowly ascending from the hillside. above it several hundred feet in the sky, was another silvery light that kind of blinked. it rose at the same exact pace, but looked almost like a star, flitting in little circles as if trying to stay in place. once the paneled lights were a couple hundred feet above where they had arisen, both lights began to head from the eastern sky to the southern, at an unhurried, casual pace. i became aware of another light in front of the big one, a small gold orb. all three objects kept in some strange, equally balanced flight path. never accelerating nor falling back more than the space they'd risen to sky in, yet moving along the sky. it's hard to explain. this occurred around nine pm. 
a couple weeks ago, my whole family was home, it was late afternoon. a very loud roar that shook the house rang through an approximate 10 mile radius. it was out of nowhere, there were no clouds, no jet streams. there is a base(s) in the city, but we are nowhere near it. we don't hear war games. and we've never heard anything like it before or since. my father was outside, he said it sounded very metallic and loud. i asked around in the community and a few others living around the roads here also heard it and found it strange. some explain it away as something to do with the wind turbine farms in the neighboring town, but again.... we don't hear anything to do with them, and they've been built around for years. we've never heard a peep. 
and only one sound? 

tonight i saw two of the long paneled lights instead, rising from that eastern hill. this happened around 8:30. around 9 ish, i became aware of a very bright white orange light. it didn't hover, it was absolutely stationary. and it was there for some time, looking to either be mere feet above my garage, and small looking, or much higher and much larger. the light was so bright it cast a long shape "twinkle" shape that didn't move. i watched it for a good ten minutes. before it silently, casually turned and bumbled off in a smooth flight path to the southeast, southern sky. 

i've seen strange shapes walking around out there in the middle of the night. complete soundlessness..... 

i'm honestly baffled and terrified. i really would like to speak with someone.... i think it needs to be staked out, which i could assist with, and host. i need to know i'm not crazy. i need to know if i can believe the lights in the sky. i can't bring myself to walk back to that hill alone, something drives me inside. i used to feel safe beneath the sky, now all i see is some slinking menace. i don't believe i have a camera powerful enough to capture anything. please help. thank you p
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Terrifying flitting lights with no logical explanation please please read

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home along a remote highway in february, well below freezing, when i noticed a white light off in the distance behind me.  i thought it was another vehicle along the highway, as it seemed to follow the topography, but the speed at which it caught up to me was at least twice the highway speed i was driving.  thinking it was another passenger vehicle wanting to pass, i slowed down slightly and veered off to the edge of the lane to allow easier passing but the single bright light did not pass me.  in fact, the light did not move at all.  it was at eye level with me in my vehicle, and it followed me at a distance of less than 10ft behind my bumper.  because it did not pass me, i sped up and the light kept up with me going faster than highway speed as well.  it was then that i began to think that something was "off" about this light behind me, as it didn't move side to side like a normal vehicle or motorcycle, and it didn't seem urgent to pass me.  i didn't want to pull over as the area i was in can be home to some rough first nations groups, so i kept driving but turned my radio off.  
there are no street lights on this road, or homes close by, so i couldn't make out the shape of the object shining the light behind me.  after these tense 5 minutes, the light shining behind me went out all of a sudden, and i began to feel scared.  i looked in all my mirrors and directly behind me to see if the object had turned off on a side road but i couldn't see anything going in those directions.  i kept looking around and after 10 seconds a set of car lights coming the opposite way down the highway appeared over the small hill coming towards me.  i waited another 25 seconds for the car to pass me and see if there was anything still behind me, but when the car passed i couldn't see anything behind me.  i still made it to my destination on time, but i cannot figure out what it was that i saw that night.
content.summary: Followed by bright light at close distance while driving on remote highway; no sound, not helicopter, disappeared instantly without trace

content.detailedDescription: Was going to bed and every thing became see through and everything was illuminated like it was noon in mid summer
content.summary: Everything in my cabin illuminated and was see through i can't explain it but i've never been so scared in my life i loaded 4 weapons knowing full well what ever was there i felt it was useless but my son and wife were sleeping and i wasn't giving up

content.detailedDescription: Cooking dinner for my family went outside to let the dog relieve himself when i saw to be a glowing orange ball flying across the horizon while i was trying to comprehend what i was seeing an identical object was trailing not far behind and then another quickly i realized what i was watching was not natural came inside got my wife and we both started watching more craft my wife told me to go get the camera which i really did not want to for being afraid of missing this awing sight but i went and retrieved my phone when i came out more objects were coming in formation looking like an eifel tower shape we also called family members that also viewed the objects and i also informed police who called back to ask if an officer could come by and view the video it was just a jaw dropping moment some of the objects blinked out going southwest while others stayed constant and headed south.
content.summary: Family and i witnessed over 20 bright orange objects some flying in formation i even reported it to the police who called me back to ask if an officer could come out and view the video.

content.detailedDescription: On december 11, 2017, a family friend shared a video he took near sour lake, texas of four staggered lights, changing color rapidly and floating in formation 10 or so miles southwest of the bridge he was filming from. on the following day, just hours before writing this report, i went to the very same bridge around the same time, 6:00 pm, and witnessed much the same as he did. the family friend also showed up and witnessed the event. this time, the lights began as three and gradually grew in number to five. the way they did this is indiscernible, it seemed as though one light would merge with another and form into one, or break off into two. they looked like large stars, flashing all colors of the rainbow randomly. some lights maintained cooler colors, some warmer, and one remained glowing white throughout. around the area, same as the previous day, there were between 5 and 10 aircraft circling the area. we watched for almost 45 minutes, before i took to the general perimeter of the event. due to the low elevation of most of our part of the state, i caught only a few glimpses on the round trip, but when i returned to the bridge about an hour later, one light was still visible. i filmed for a few minutes before being stopped by a police officer, who let me go without even asking for my license after seeing the light as well. he did tell me not to linger long, but in the few minutes i stayed after he had left, two more lights had reappeared. i left the bridge at about 8:10 with three lights in the sky.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Colorful, staggered lights numbering from one to five and fluctuating in appearance, surrounded by aircraft

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and me took our dog for a walk we live in vancleave ms. as we looked around back yard, we spotted 5 (five) ufo's looked to me almost due west maybe over orange grove, lyman. these objects continued their dance, 1 of them stopped, stationary. then, it went straight up at an incredible rate of speed.So fast, like lightning.As i said, there were 5, the brightest in center position, with the others maneuvering around it. we watched for 10 or 12 minutes, and i brought a neighbor. he also witnessed it. the speeds! and then came, you guessed it. 90 degrees turns at 1000, 2000.Mph. the larger of these craft emitted some kind of smoke or chemical behind it.So, i, my wife and our neighbor saw these things. it was unbelievable and of course none of us had cameras with us. i'm going out again right now
first sighting was 1900. we watched 10 to 12 minutes. my son stopped by around 2025 .  objects were still there, but seemed to be further west.  in all, there were 7 witnesses.


thanks, gary helton
content.summary: I, my wife, and 5 others saw apparent ufo's1st sighting 7 pm, last at 8;35 pm

content.detailedDescription: A group of 4 went to hike the thomas divide trail and we had passed other people on the trail. when we arrived at our destination it was getting dark and one of our friends went to use the bathroom and spotted lights along the opposite side of the mountain. when she called to us to come look one of the guy's said that he had heard of the light's  (brown mountain light's ) and they seemed to move. on our way out we noticed more light's on the opposite side of the mountain. when we stopped to look one person yelled "what is that" we all stood silently and scared out of our minds. it first looked like it was stopped then it came closer and we all thought we heard a humming sound coming from it. it seemed to have heat waves coming from it. we tried to run down the hill but fail many times. we got back to town to tell people at a local gas station and they said they knew about the light's along the mountain but not of any ufos. we were told to go to the thomas divide lookout where there were two car's and everyone had been watching the light's since dark. we asked if they had seen anything else they said a plane came directly over where we had been but no ufo in the sky.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A couple of friends hiked the thomas divide in cherokee nc on thanksgiving day and saw unknown lights  then a black triangle with red center

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from work, eastwards, on the highway. i noticed a bright object that seemed to be hovering overhead (over a field) in the distance. at first, i thought it must be the moon peeking out -- it was bright -- but then realized that there were no clouds. the object grew brighter. there appeared to be a bank of lights on the outside. note that i could not look continuously as i was driving at 80 kph. as i drew nearer to the object, i realized that it did not appear to be a helicopter and that it was not moving. it seemed to be rather large -- certainly larger than any aircraft i've ever seen. it appeared to be round or cylindrical in shape. suddenly, after about four or five minutes of observation, it blinked out of sight completely. it was as if someone had pulled the light switch. just then, a commercial aircraft passed directly underneath where it had been hovering (note that there is an airport nearby). 

i do not have a photograph, but i have found one that looks like what i saw.
content.summary: Bright lights hovering overhead, disappeared completely just before a commerical aircraft passed directly in its path.

content.detailedDescription:
During the summer of 1970 i experienced a ufo sighting while backpacking with my girlfriend in the yosemite california area.  my girlfriend and i left yosemite valley heading for tuolumne meadows on a 4-day backpacking trip.  we departed from the east end of the valley near mirror lake and headed toward hidden lake.  
it was our second day out i think, and we made camp next to a stream.  there was a meadow about 60 yards in diameter to the west, so we decided to sleep in the middle of it.  we took our sleeping bags out there and put our ground cloths down and saw the sky framed by the tops of the trees.  we were at an elevation of approximately 8,000 feet.  it was summer time late july or early august.  we had not seen any other people on the trail for over a day and as far as we knew there were no people within miles of us.
as we were watching the sky, suddenly, a large object came over the top of the trees from the west.  it glowed from within but not like a balloon. it made no noise as it moved into our field of vision and eventually was directly overhead, we were standing looking at it and talking to each other in disbelief. on the bottom of the craft it had 3 lights and each one rotated in a small circle.   they were positioned close to the outside edge and in an equilateral triangle configuration. i can only guess at the size of the object, but my guess would be 300 feet in diameter and 1500 feet high. i remembered the color of lights at one time but only know the lights were red, blue and yellow now as a guess.  
i remember talking with my girlfriend to confirm she was seeing the same thing and she was. i clearly remember the feeling that this was a very unique experience and was excited.  at the time i had no awareness of flying saucers or ufo’s.  i was 19 years old at the time. the craft then zoomed at a very high rate of speed, several miles away to the east and stopped and hovered for a couple of seconds and then a beam of light came out of it toward the ground.  a flash of light came up from the ground and then it took off out of our range of vision.
i remember talking to her about the experience and we were at a loss for what it could have been.  the following day we encountered some other hikers and we asked them if they had seen anything unusual the night before.  they hadn’t and then we recounted our experience and they were interested in our experience and one person said they had seen a blue ball of energy travelling up yosemite valley one time from vernal toward nevada falls.  this had occurred at another time and long before our encounter.
we completed our trip without any further sightings.  i eventually lost touch with this person, but we did speak of it several times in the few months following.
content.summary: Backpacking w girlfriend. no drugs, both saw object come overhead slowly then zoom off extremely fast

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was at home when this happened in columbia mo.  i was on facebook and seen some post that people were seeing some strange lights in the sky in ste. genevieve mo, a lot of people were saying the same thing in the comments. so i decided i'd go take a look myself to see if i could see anything.  i live out in the country with no so close neighbors.  when i first went outside i didn't see anything.  i went out my back door so i decided i go to my front yard to see if there was anything still nothing. but my dog started barking and went running, i then turned around to go back to my backyard and then that's when i seen an object hovering over my barn, the barn from me was about 100 yards so the light the object was giving off was super bright.  it hoovered enough for me to go run inside to get my nikon coolpix camera. when i went back outside it was still hovering over my barn.  the time was around 11pm. i was able to start recording the object as soon as it started to take off slowly.  i live pretty close to the missouri river so the direction it was heading was towards the river.  where i live i see all kinds of weird stuff.
content.summary: The object hovered over my barn for a few minutes it was super bright then slowly took off.

content.detailedDescription: I went for a ride and saw a massive light looked like the moon but had a shadow around it metal like. i stopped the car and watched it fly by the sighting actually made me angry. i later learned on fb that i wasn't the only person to see this and it actually caused a car accident involving a police car. i'll never forget it and feel proud that i've seen it now.After this sighting i've seen many smaller craft and it now doesn't even surprise me.
content.summary: Was huge looked like the moon slowly flying by but i noticed something around the huge light i thought maybe the actual craft idk

content.detailedDescription:
"i was coming home from work in beaumont, tx to sour lake, tx at 5:40 pm on december 11th via hwy 105. halfway home i saw 4 bright lights in the west. they were in a perfect staggered formation. i then lost them in the trees. when i got to sour lake i went to the overpass on hwy 326. when i got on top i could see the lights but there were only 2. i started filming with my cell phone and a third and a forth reappeared. after 5 minutes or so, lights dimmed on one. i could then see red, green, and blue blinking lights. it then took off but soon came back. i noticed other aircraft that looked like planes flying around the larger objects."

~video filmer
content.summary: Four flying, glowing spheres moving ponderously above either an oilfield or rice farm, pursued by no less than 5 aircraft.

content.detailedDescription: I was inside my car when i opened the object and took my camera and it did not make any noise. disappeared behind a tree get off the car to see it and it was not gone or disappeared
content.summary: Spherical luminous object

content.detailedDescription: We, my family came home at midnight seeing two flying saucers over the corn field . we video and took pics . saw aliens right in front of my girlfriend .. we went inside quickly and it was 431am. the next morning my girlfriend started bleeding out of her vaginal region my daughter her stomach hurt and missed 28 days of school and had to move to maryland with her dad i have issues with my testicles. so this went on for about a year inside my house .. we finally left everything in the house and moved out , to a friend's house , where these humanoids and aliens folled us .. it hadn't stopped yet and i have tangible evidence including a block of wood they carved with some lazer or.Something and i would like that looked at by your scientists . i have pics and videos of humanoids aliens, crafts circular and triagular . seen them turn clear from white and back to white showing me the technology. please contact me and as well you may contact my therapist kathy adams she has seen some of my pics and talked to me in depth ..My cell number is 443 401 9270 and kathy adams number is 301 460 7676 thank you . i have a very long story and history of aliens and their crafts .
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: I and my family at the time were abducted, this went on for a year. i have many videos and pictues

content.detailedDescription: Sleeping at home, aliens entered my home and took me, i did not see outside of craft but very large inside. aliens appeared to be humanoid but looked like an apparition, i was pissed, they regularly ruin my sleep. in my mind they call me a 1957 baby, they used our date because they have a different understanding of time which i can’t grasp. the fuckers experiment on me and it really hurts. i have learned much and have been threatened by phone from some group to keep my mouth shut, but i have to tell someone.
content.summary: Abducted many times afraid to report, before my mother died she told me i was implanted in her by aliens.

content.detailedDescription: I seen two stationary lights that were orange, gold, yellow, silver, white, flickering and stationary lights that slowly disappeared, the right one before the other. i was traveling westbound on northern boulevard heading towards 303 when i noticed the lights. when i gotten on the 303 the lights continued to stay at the same height, they did not move left or right either. i shot some video of the lights because it was out of the ordinary for there is a lot of air traffic around the phoenix area. i had exited route 303 at glendale boulevard in pulled over to shoot the video. as i was shooting the video, the right light slowly disappeared and then the left about 30 seconds later.
content.summary: 2, orange gold yellow silver flickering, stationary lights, out of the ordinary

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from another family members home. my 2 daughters and granddaughters were following me home. i have seen various multiple different objects. i was very afraid and thought i was crazy. but when my daughter's following told me they saw it too i was relieved. that same night before we left. 2 bright lights flashed in the living room window. its like they were oblivious to us as we were driving though. like they were looking for a different dimension. or maybe we could see a different dimension.
content.summary: A large cigar shaped large craft moving slowly but it was moving with the widest side was the front and it had a large window. we could see 4 giant beings standing looking out. had a orange glow inside craft. felt very electric in the air. silent. seemed

content.detailedDescription: I was driving my step son to basketball practice. we arrived at about 5:30pm and were waiting for his coach in the parking lot as we were early. it gets dark here at about 4:40pm so the sun had already set and it was night. as we were waiting in the car i noticed a few lights in the sky hovering above the tree tops. i kinda brushed it off at first as low flying helicopters, but as the minutes passed i noticed the lights were not moving and were hovering in place. there were 3 of them and they were pure white and seemed to be pulsating simultaneously. they didn’t flash like helicopters or airplanes. no blue or red blinks. they would move up and down, left and right but never moved forward and always kept a triangular shape. at this point it started to creep me out and i turned to my step son who is 13 and told him to look. we continued to watch them and try to figure out what they were. as we were watching them they turned from 3 objects to 4. i don’t know if one was behind the other and came out or if it came out of the other orbs. two of the orbs were very bright white while they other two seemed to be more faint. i took out my phone and snapped 2 pictures. the objects were far away from me so i had to zoom in and my phone didn’t capture them as clearly as i would of liked so i tried to record a video. i only recorded for a few seconds before some of the other kids started showing up and i had to stop filming. after my step son went inside i could still see the lights. this is after about 6-7 minutes. i decided i would drive to try and get closer to see what it was or if i could get a better picture. i unfortunately lost the lights in my attempt. hoping you all can shed some light on this and possibly even explain it so i can sleep peacefully at night. but from my point of view it was very strange and left me feeling very creeped out after.
content.summary: 3 pulsating pure white spheres hovering in triangular shape. turned to 4 spheres.

content.detailedDescription:
That night at my grandmother's house. wc is out of the house. i went out to go to wc. it was about 3 am. my grandmother's backyard is very large and behind the house is a large garden with many trees that have no lights.
the instant i came out of the house i immediately saw that object. the top of the trees at the bottom of the yard. i think the diameter was a bus size. it was silver and slightly shiny with white and blue lights.
i did not feel scared and curiously went to the middle of the yard, but when i got closer, it moved back. when i was moving, i felt a sense of a warning to my mind. i was afraid and persistent.
i looked at it for about a minute, so long, i felt like he was looking at me. then i went back a few steps and then went back and then suddenly disappeared quickly to the top.
content.summary: I saw it at midnight in the backyard of my grandmother's village house. in the garden behind the house, it looked like a saucer and was silent. with white and blue lights, i felt like looking at me.

content.detailedDescription: On 12/11/2017 i was driving south on i-75 between mile markers 125 and 126 a little bit south of macon, ga at approximately 22:15 est. i caught movement out of my peripheral vision and looked out the passenger side of my windshield to see a bright ball of light hovering just above the tree line. as i watched the hair on the back of my neck stood up and i got goosebumps up and down my arms. the ball was a very bright white light and looked to be about 50-75 yards away. it hovered over the trees for a couple of seconds and made a rapid (1-2 seconds) vertical decent into the trees. it didn’t flicker behind the trees but kept the same brightness and solid ball shape. it looked to be between the size of a golf ball and a small tangerine at that distance.
content.summary: Bright white sphere hovering then vertical rapid decent into trees

content.detailedDescription: I walked out to my backyard,i looked up noticed a reddish, orange object,it moved slow from west to east towards me,it then dropped three small silver lights simultaneously, then turned headed south and just fadded out and disappeared, at the same time, a second, identical object  was following , got to the same spot , but did not drop any lights, turned and headed south and disappeared, it was about 5 minutes, i had yelled for my husband and roommate they saw the first one disappear,but not the silver lights dropped, they also observed the second object dissapear.
content.summary: Observed two objects first one droped three silver objects then veered south then disappeared,followed by the second and it disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Around 10:00am on october 5th while completing an air quality assessment of a facility located adjacent to the columbia river in bingen washington, i spotted an unusual looking craft in the sky. it was white in color and appeared to be stationary. within a few seconds of noticing the object it took off heading in an westerly direction. there was no sound and no emissions coming from the craft. it appeared to be roughly the size of a ups truck. it did not appear to have conventional wings. it was cylindrical in shape exhibiting a couple of darker areas or shadows. there was structure above the back of the object on both sides that appeared to be hexagon shaped. within a few seconds the object changed its direction flying in a sharp radius and began heading east. it crested over the mountain and disappeared. i got the feeling it was trying to get away from view.
content.summary: When i first spotted the object, it appeared to be stationary. within a few seconds the object began to silently fly in a westerly direction. after a short distance, it banked 180 degrees to the east and disappeared  over the mountains.

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from work in beaumont, tx to sour lake, tx at 5:40 pm on december 11th via hwy 105. halfway home i saw 4 bright lights in the west. they were in a perfect staggered formation. i then lost them in the trees. when i got to sour lake i went to the overpass on hwy 326. when i got on top i could see the lights but there were only 2. i started filming with my cell phone and a third and a forth reappeared. after 5 minutes or so, lights dimmed on one. i could then see red, green, and blue blinking lights. it then took off but soon came back. i noticed other aircraft that looked like planes flying around the larger objects.
content.summary: 4 lights hovered and were bright. the main light dimmed and then you could see blinking lights. hovered for 20 minutes and then took off. several other planes and helicopter were flying around them.

content.detailedDescription: I went out to my backyard to take out my dog to do its business. i look up to the sky because i like to look at the stars. i wanted to see if i could see a shooting star. and that's when i see a star moving. at first i think, nice a shooting star but it just kept going and very slowly, like really slow. i begin to think it's a plane but the light looks to small to be a plane and it's not blinking as plane lights would. as i continue to look, i realise there is a grey circle around the light. the light is right in the center of the grey circle outline. in the spaces inside the circle and the light it almost looks transparent. it look just as the black sky. so pretty much all that is visible is the grey circle outline and the white small light that very strongly resembles a star. as soon as i realise that what i'm starting it is not a plane, i slight freeze. not in fear, just in pure awe that i'm standing here staring at a ufo. i just kept looking at it as it continuedoes to move slowly in a straight path. i was hoping for it to stop or turn to truly confirm my suspicions of it being a ufo, but it only continued to move straightforward. i lost sight of it as the house next to me blocked my view of where it went. i didn't think to take a picture because i know my phone can't capture the stars so how could it capture this that is as small and dim as a star. i was upset once i couldn't see it. i went inside and called my mom outside. i told her about it and i tried to look for it once again but i couldn't find it and neither my mom.
content.summary: Looked like a star, but it was moving very slowly. light too small to be a plane, grey circle around light.

content.detailedDescription:
We trip by national route 281 to puerto deseado (santa cruz, patagonia, argentina) at the atlantic ocean coast, later by provintial route 68, and later by provintial route 70, and (so tired) by provintial route 14, and directly want to visit the antique and forgotten post office at mazaredo site.
this is a part of the antique president roca tlegraph (year 1905) next to mazaredo bay (argentine coast), which came up to virgins cape in the magallanes strait in that year.
that mega construction with towers of 210 feets hight and thousands of post (eucalyptus) and wires was forgotten in the time.
the antique post office was made in red patagonic hard stones and is totally beatifull.
we arrive at night and see not other people in the area, we were plans to stay there a week, but the place awaiting us with a surprise.
in the early morning we go to the sea (4 miles away), we chosed go by foot to make natural phot and video.
in the trip we cu off by a "ravine" (a little canyon) of 150 feets tall or less, in a curve of this we can see at the top five white range rover evoque, some people dressed in rare almost traslucid clothes, three 30 feets towers and one big artifact with cone shape.
the last was pointed to the sea and it sounded like to an exact whale song, almost ten second wecan see a flash pulse in direction to the sea horizon and then from there something answered from the sea, again and again.
this people see us and we waved our hands to say hello and they did the same.
when we arrive to the coast, we find two men more, they talk with us and said "hello, are you here to see the post office?" (???)
we said "yes" and they said "you are needed to see a last telegraph reference, a bronze tribute plate", and then said which direction we must to go (1 mille from there).
we question about the vehicles and towers, and the cone, they said "we are looking for something, it is a scientific stuff, important for us".
in the next three days that vehicles and that people stay there, we see them ten times but never we go where they are.
the telezoom photographs were taken blanked, we have not problems, or car damages, or health riks, we are ok and go to our business.
now we can see the area in satellite images and can see there a remarkable triangle in the same place when the five vehicles was stay parked ¿coincidence ?.
content.summary: Other white vehicles in patagonia

content.detailedDescription:
It was on december 3rd at around 6:05 pm on my 3rd floor balcony apartment facing east taking pictures of the super moon when i noticed a red light come across from the right (south) traveling to the left (north)then started to go upwards then suddenly stopped, blinked a white light a few times and started to descend back towards the south. this is in 1 of the 2 videos i captured. there was also 1 or 2 smaller white lights somewhat faded following the red light flying much quicker and sudden as if they were guiding or escorting the red light? i then noticed 2 streaks of exhaust? above the moon and then in front of the moon as time went by dont know if it came from the ufo's or if there were fighter jets that passed if so i didn't here any sound.
my wife though it could be a drone but i though it was to big from that distance to be a drone. i stopped video recording as the red light did not re- appear after descending but one of the small lights was still there above the tree line or buildings. on one of the pictures in which we see the object or red light when i zoom in on the object looks square shaped. i was convinced and still am that it was a ufo i always hoped to witness a sighting and with your knowledge and experience i hope you can tell me if i'm right.
                                  thank you dany gagne
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red light traveling right to left then left to right blinking light red then white followed by other small faded lights.

content.detailedDescription: It was at 12:43 a.M. when i took my dogs out for their potty break as i work nights from home (7 p.M. - 3 a.M.).  it was a cloudy night and so i was checking out how the moon was glowing (it was in the se) and then directly to the right of the moon i saw a flickering or flashing type light which i thought may be an aircraft (as there is an airport in sacramento area (and i live 40 miles north of sac), but it was moving up and down and zig-zagging..... which a plane cannot!  so, i ran in the house and grabbed my cellphone to get a picture of it.  i was thinking oh my gosh, no way.... this is really happening!!  i mean, we have chemtrails all over the place here and we are right near beale air force base (where the stealth was originally created and trained on).  also, i know beale has a lot of secret information and things they are working on that their employees cannot talk about.  however, that is e from where i live (about 38 miles).  okay, then i had my cellphone and filmed some of the item fading into the clouds and coming out and moving around in an unusual manner.  it was impossible to get a distance feeling of it or a static feeling of where it was going with no stars out or reference points.  i did not feel it was real close, but i could see it fairly well.  some of my pictures, especially when i froze the frame of the video, it had a saw blade looking edge to it but on others, it looked like a ghostly orb.  strange but not something i had ever seen before either.  it does not start appearing in the video until almost halfway through as it must have been behind the clouds.  hope you can figure this thing out.  :)
content.summary: Saw flickering/flash-like sphere with light on a cloudy night, then it moved up and down, bouncing around.

content.detailedDescription:
Luzes duplas vermelhas muito fortes (como se de laser) e em tamanho parecidas com as de um refletor de helicóptero em meio a tempo chuvoso/nublado. estavam paradas no céu (sem piscarem) no que pode-se dizer seja a região do setor militar urbano / memorial jk (visão da asa sul, altura do eixão). alguns segundos após meu avistamento (+- 15 segundos) houve movimentação abrupta para cima, talvez algumas dezenas de metros em menos de 1 segundo. em seguida, as luzes foram apagando-se e sumiram (demorou menos de 1 segundo também).
minha verificação online por aviões na área deu negativa.
content.summary: 2 luzes vermelhas próximas muito fortes em meio a tempo chuvoso - movimentaram-se para cima abruptamente e se apagaram

content.detailedDescription: I was laying in bed on my phone at 12am. then all of a sudden i noticed lights outside my window. i could see the lights shine through my blinds. i opened them and saw 3-5 different orb/shpere shapped objects giving off a very bright light, hovering above my neighbors house. they were the size of tennis balls but could have been much bigger as i could have been viewing them from a distance. i could not tell how far away they were. at first there was only 1 object but after about 5 minutes more came. there was about 3-5 in total. they then began to change direction very quickly and it seemed as if they were chasing eachother. they were moving to fast and changing direction so quickly and so frequently it could not have been a plane. this lasted for about an hour and then they flew off. i have seen nothing remotely the same since. i have 3 seperate videos of the event.
content.summary: Saw lights outside of window so opened curtains. then these orbs of light started shooting off in all different directions. not sure how far away they were but coukd see them hovering above neighbors house/behind.

content.detailedDescription: Glowing planet like orb
content.summary: I was taking pics of chemtrails noticed orb took a few shots with phone went to get camera then it was gone.
